variables.rcbx: AU MÊME NIVEAU QUE LE DOSSIER "themes"

text.name: helpInformations
text.text:
CUSTOMIZATION HELP: COPY "_rcbxCustom" FOLDER AT ${rcbx} TO CUSTOMIZE WITHOUT LOOSE ANY WORK WHEN YOU UPDATE THEME.
SYSTEM FULL NAME : ${system.fullName} (${system.hardwareType})
THEME : ${system.theme} -------------------------------------------------- WHAT YOU CAN CUSTOMIZE: -------------------------------------------------- - PAINTS : ${system.theme}.jpg or ${system.theme}.png
- LOGOS : ${system.theme}.png or ${system.theme}.svg
- VIDEOS : ${system.theme}.mp4
- MUSICS : ${system.theme}.mp3 or ${system.theme}.ogg
- ILLUSTRATIONS : ${system.theme}.png or ${system.theme}.svg
- ENTER MESSAGES OR EXTENDED INFOS : ${system.theme}.xml or ${system.theme}_replace.xml for rewrite extended infos
- SYSTEM SCROLL SOUND : system.wav
- GAMELIST SCROLL SOUNDS : ${system.theme}.wav - gamelist.wav - grid.wav - gamecarousel.wav
